attributes.action: Treat the English Equally To The Scottish, The Welsh & The Irish.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to reports that Scotland are now also going to enjoy free prescriptions, dental checks, sight tests, school dinners etc. we petition that the people of England have the right to the same and that equal treatment be served across the entire UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
